General.Name: Betonjaya Manunggal Tbk
General.Description: PT Betonjaya Manunggal Tbk produces and sells round bars in Indonesia. Its products are primarily used in the construction of buildings, including high rise building and housing. PT Betonjaya Manunggal Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Gresik, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Krikilan No.434 Km.28, Gresik, Indonesia, 61177

2.Name: Dr. Andy  Soesanto MBA, MM
2.Title: Operational Director, Corp. Sec. & Independent Director
